Name: BBlocks
About the game: Join a few blocks here, a little there and watch the blocks unite like magic. BBlocks is a fun game for you to train your agility and reasoning skills. Your goal is to position as many blocks as possible in the right position, if the blocks reach the sky, you lose. If you join the blocks in the right position they will come together and disappear, if they get in the wrong position they will continue there. Pass levels, increase punctuation, do everything you need, just do not let the blocks reach the sky. Are you ready for the adventure?
Meta Title: BBlocks: Dec 1, 2018, Softwaves Mini and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on BBlocks? Check out the release date (Dec 1, 2018), developer insights from Softwaves Mini, and a complete game summary.
